name: Lines 3D
storyline:
Arrange the same color balls into horizontal, vertical or diagonal lines. 
There are three different board options: 
5x5 board - get 3 matching balls in a line 
7x7 board - get 4 matching balls in a line 
9x9 board - get 5 matching balls in a line 
Just touch a ball and move it to a new position to form a line. It's challenging, but you can do it. 
Enjoy!
